name: IDBIndex
description: IDBIndex interface of the IndexedDB API provides asynchronous access to an index in a database. An index is a kind of object store for looking up records in another object store, called the referenced object store. You use this interface to retrieve data.

refs.name: Indexed Database API 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'IDBIndex' in the 'Indexed Database API 2.0' specification.
